description:
Tencent Meeting Rooms integrates with various hardware devices to provide a one-stop meeting experience with audio/video conferencing, wireless screen casting, and collaborative whiteboards.

Tencent Meeting Rooms is a software system built specifically for meeting rooms that provides an integrated meeting experience with audio/video conferencing, wireless screen casting and interactive whiteboards, publishes audio/video authentication standards, and selects branded hardware consoles to provide a modern meeting room solution for enterprises together.
